title: Pre-Loading
desc: Enable if the experiment included pre-loading cycles

title: Filter Value
desc: The strain value used to distinguish between pre-loading and normal experiment cycles

title: Strain unit
desc: Enable if the strain in the input file is given in [%]

title: Output path
desc: Figures and calculation results are stored here upon saving

title: Width
desc: Specimen width in [mm] to be used in stress calculation

title: Length
desc: Specimen lenght in [mm] to be used in stress calculation

title: Cutoff factor
desc: Determines experiment end by checking for a slope bigger than the factor times the average slope

title: Smoothing for preprocessing
desc: Rolling centered mean applied to the strain-time curve for consistent cycle detection

title: Peak distance
desc: Peak distance parameter for the peak detection algorithm

title: Peak width
desc: Peak width parameter for the peak detection algorithm

title: Fit border limits
desc: Choose how the fit borders are determined

title: Upper strain
desc: Upper relative strain cutoff. Only applies if 'Static strain' option is selected

title: Lower strain
desc: Lower relative strain cutoff. Only applies if 'Static strain' option is selected

title: Relative stress cutoff
desc: Filter relative stress values (y axis) in percent. Only applies if 'Top bottom' option is selected

title: Number of sections
desc: Determines the amount of sections into which each slope is divided. Only applies if 'Sectioned best' option is selected

title: Smoothing for fitting
desc: Rolling centered mean applied twice during the fit border detection sub-step. Only applies to some fits if 'Dynamic' option is selected

title: Line length divider
desc: Division factor applied to the total section length to obtain the point connector length. Only applies to some fits if 'Dynamic' option is selected

title: Smoothing for hysteresis
desc: Rolling centered mean applied to the stress-strain curve before the calculation of the hysteresis area
